::Aerotaur::
       He continues smiling genuinely happy to see his friend again.  "Any 
idea what the disease was, maybe I can look into it, save them some time and 
all."  He smiles again not letting the concern show on his face.

--part1_12b.24745f2f.2b95044d_boundary
